pageContext.claim: “We had a little glitch in the stock market last month, but it's still up, I guess, around 30 percent from the time I got elected.”
pageContext.analysis: There was no "glitch" in the stock market, though there was plenty of trepidation about Trump's tariffs. The president usually stretches stock market gains to the max by going back to the 2016 election. The S&P 500 was up 10 percent from the date of Trump's inauguration to the date of these remarks. The Nasdaq index was up 20 percent and the Dow Jones 18 percent.
